APS_AddGroupConf_t Struct Reference

#include <aps.h>

Data Fields

APS_Status_t status

Detailed Description

Parameters of the APSME-ADD-GROUP.confirm primitive.

This interface allows the next higher layer to manage group membership for endpoints on the current device by adding and removing entries in the group table. See ZigBee spec. r18, 2.2.4.5, page 45.

Definition at line 43 of file apsmeGroup.h.

Field Documentation

APS_Status_t APS_AddGroupConf_t::status

The status of the request to add a group.
